#summary g-tube, the lightweight python GUI for GENESIS 3.

= Introduction =

The g-tube is a GUI implemented in Python which is used to add another layer of functionality to GENESIS 3.


= Details =

To install the g-tube you need these dependencies installed on your machine.

Dependencies:
  * Python
  * wxPython - http://www.wxpython.org/download.php
  * PyYAML - http://pyyaml.org/
